short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Retab updates the new tab with a list of subreddits.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Retab updates the user's new tab with a custom home screen. The home screen contains a grid list of their favorite subreddits and displays which people they follow on Twitch who are currently live.
